name: Garlic & Herb Bruschetta
description: 1 Classic Baguette; 2 ripe tomatoes, diced; 2 cloves garlic, minced; Fresh basil leaves, chopped; 2 tbsp olive oil.

ingredients: Optional: Grated Parmesan cheese or balsamic glaze for garnish
descriptionDetails:
Description

Garlic & Herb Bruschetta is a true crowd-pleaser, combining the rustic charm of our freshly baked Crumb & Co. French baguette with a vibrant mix of aromatic herbs and rich garlic. The bread’s crisp texture perfectly complements the savory garlic and fresh herbs, creating a balanced bite that’s light yet satisfying.
Ideal for any occasion, this bruschetta makes a perfect starter for a dinner party, a quick snack, or a flavorful side for soups and salads.

steps.title: Preheat the Oven
steps.description: Your oven to 400°F (200°C).

steps.title: Prepare the Baguette
steps.description: Slice the Crumb & Co. French baguette into 1/2-inch thick pieces and place them on a baking sheet.

steps.title: Make the Garlic Herb Mixture
steps.description: In a small bowl, combine the minced garlic, basil, parsley, oregano, and olive oil. Add salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: Brush the Baguette
steps.description: Using a brush, generously apply the garlic.

steps.title: Bake
steps.description: Place the tray in the preheated oven and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the bread is golden and crispy.

steps.title: Garnish & Serve
steps.description: Remove from the oven and optionally garnish with grated Parmesan or a drizzle of balsamic glaze. Serve warm and enjoy!

tips.text: For an extra burst of flavor, try adding diced tomatoes or roasted peppers on top before serving.
These bruschettas go best with dry white wine. Try them as an appetizer!

name: Multigrain Bread Pudding
description: A wholesome dessert made with multigrain bread, creamy custard, and hints of warm spices.

ingredients: Optional: Raisins or chopped nuts for garnish
descriptionDetails:
Description

Multigrain Bread Pudding is a comforting and satisfying dessert that combines the nutty flavor of multigrain bread with a creamy, custard-like texture.
Perfect for holiday gatherings or as a cozy treat, this pudding is easy to prepare and endlessly customizable.

steps.title: Preheat the Oven
steps.description: To 350°F (175°C) and grease a baking dish.

steps.title: Prepare the Bread
steps.description: Cut the multigrain bread into cubes and place them in the greased baking dish.

steps.title: Make the Custard
steps.description: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, cream, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

steps.title: Combine
steps.description: Pour the custard mixture over the bread cubes, pressing gently to soak evenly.

steps.title: Bake
steps.description: Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the top is golden and the custard is set.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Let cool slightly, then serve warm. Optionally garnish with raisins or nuts.

tips.text: For a richer taste, use day-old multigrain bread to absorb the custard better.
Pair with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for an indulgent dessert.

name: Sourdough Avocado Toast
description: A simple yet delicious breakfast or snack featuring creamy avocado on hearty sourdough bread.

ingredients: Optional: Red pepper flakes, sesame seeds, or fresh herbs for garnish
descriptionDetails:
Description

Sourdough Avocado Toast is a quick and nutritious option that’s perfect for any time of the day.
The creamy avocado pairs beautifully with the tangy sourdough, creating a satisfying and healthy meal.

steps.title: Prepare the Bread
steps.description: Toast the sourdough bread slices to your desired level of crispiness.

steps.title: Mash the Avocado
steps.description: In a bowl, mash the avocados with lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

steps.title: Assemble
steps.description: Spread the mashed avocado mixture evenly over the toasted sourdough slices.

steps.title: Garnish & Serve
steps.description: Add optional toppings like red pepper flakes or sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

tips.text: For extra protein, add a poached or fried egg on top of the avocado toast.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze for a tangy finish.

name: Cinnamon Swirl Rolls
description: A delightful combination of buttery croissants and cinnamon swirl rolls filled with creamy and flavorful ingredients.

descriptionDetails:
Description

Cinnamon Swirl Rolls Croissant Sandwich Delight is a perfect balance of buttery croissants, sweet cinnamon rolls, and a creamy filling, ideal for breakfast or as a dessert treat.
This dish combines the richness of croissants with the sweet spice of cinnamon, making it a delightful option for special occasions or a luxurious brunch.

steps.title: Prepare the Cream Cheese Filling
steps.description: In a bowl, mix the softened cream cheese, powdered sugar, and vanilla extract until smooth and creamy.

steps.title: Assemble the Croissant Sandwiches
steps.description: Spread a generous layer of the cream cheese filling on the bottom half of each croissant.

steps.title: Add Cinnamon Roll Slices
steps.description: Place a slice of cinnamon swirl roll on top of the cream cheese layer.

steps.title: Add Strawberries
steps.description: Layer sliced strawberries on top of the cinnamon roll slice for a fresh and fruity touch.

steps.title: Top with Croissant Halves
steps.description: Place the top half of the croissant over the strawberries to complete the sandwich.

steps.title: Drizzle with Honey or Syrup
steps.description: Drizzle honey or maple syrup over the top for added sweetness before serving.

tips.text: For extra flavor, sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon sugar on the cream cheese filling before assembling.
Serve slightly warmed for a melty and luxurious texture.

name: Croissant Sandwich Delight
description: A savory and satisfying croissant sandwich filled with fresh greens, deli meat, and creamy dressing.

descriptionDetails:
Description

Croissant Sandwich Delight is a versatile recipe that brings together flaky croissants, fresh vegetables, and delicious deli meat for a quick and satisfying meal.
Perfect for lunch or a light dinner, this sandwich is customizable to suit your taste preferences.

steps.title: Prepare the Croissants
steps.description: Slice the croissants in half horizontally and optionally toast them for a crispier texture.

steps.title: Spread the Dressing
steps.description: Spread a thin layer of mayonnaise or aioli on the bottom half of each croissant.

steps.title: Add the Deli Meat
steps.description: Layer slices of turkey or ham on top of the dressing.

steps.title: Add the Cheese
steps.description: Place a slice of Swiss or cheddar cheese over the deli meat.

steps.title: Add the Vegetables
steps.description: Top with fresh lettuce leaves and slices of tomato. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: Assemble and Serve
steps.description: Place the top half of the croissant over the fillings. Serve immediately and enjoy!

tips.text: For extra flavor, add a slice of avocado or a dollop of honey mustard.
Try heating the sandwich briefly in a sandwich press for a warm and melty texture.
